participant_1.background:
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I watched a movie marathon on my last birthday.
i am retired.
i think beets are the best vegetable.
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games.
it s important for my instagram posts to look like i m having fun.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.
i am primarily a meat eater.
i watch a lot of spongebob.

content.text: I'm doing okay! I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I know how you feel! I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health. It's a lot to balance.
I'm glad you can relate! My last birthday was a movie marathon, but this year I want to do something more active with my kids.
That's a great idea! Last year I spent my birthday with my family at our farm, eating a delicious home-cooked meal and playing games. It was a lot of fun.
That sounds amazing! I love the idea of spending time with my family on my birthday.
Me too! It's so important to make time for the people you love.
I agree! I think I'm going to take them to the zoo this year.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm sure they'll love it.
Thanks! I'm excited to spend time with them.
Me too! I'm sure it will be a lot of fun.
